name: put_terms_of_services_id
description: Updates a specific terms of service.

terms_of_service_id.description: The ID of the terms of service.

status.description: Whether this terms of service is active.

text.description:
The terms of service text to display to users.

The text can be set to empty if the `status` is set to `disabled`.
text.example: By collaborating on this file you are accepting...

$block:
The root-level record that is supposed to represent a
single Terms of Service.

$ul: **id**: The unique identifier for this terms of service.
**created_at**: When the legal item was created
**modified_at**: When the legal item was modified.
**status**: Whether these terms are enabled or not
**text**: The text for your terms and conditions. This text could be
**tos_type**: Whether to apply these terms to managed users or external users

**message**: A short message describing the error.
